author: cframpton
msg: BlazeDS integration is now optional since BlazeDS has an incompatible license.  The download of BlazeDS to retrieve flex-messaging-common.jar now has an explicit prompt as required by Apache (http://www.apache.org/legal/3party.html#options-optional).
